html:
1.31.18  4:57 pm   I've got midterms tomorrow. Any advice?

     try to figure out the answers

1.31.18  4:34 pm   tell me something you've googled before

     how to make a gmail account

1.31.18  4:33 pm   how to live

     so far you are doing great

1.31.18  4:25 pm   What's the weirdest question you've gotten on here?

     11.1.16  1:21 pm , 6.27.16  11:51 am

1.31.18  4:10 pm   ARE YOU A CAPITAL LETTER HATER?

     no

1.31.18  4:02 pm   Could and would you host a live QNA steam?

     i prefer to do questions here, on this page

1.31.18  3:43 pm   Did you ever "Hmmmmmmm?"d to something?

     it seems like i do it all the time

1.31.18  3:28 pm   Are you a caveman?

     yes but i was adopted into a house

1.31.18  3:27 pm   Didn't you write "La de da de da de da de day oh" like six years ago?

     the la de da part was written 6 years ago. the first verse was mostly written 9 years ago. the second verse and everything else was written right before i started recording it, in 2017

1.31.18  3:20 pm   hey bill, have you recently gone through a break up?

     no

      I just wanted to let you know, anytime you need it, my grandma would like to cook you a warm loving meal. She's not single, but she loves you. peace on earth.

1.31.18  3:15 pm   what pronouns do you use?

     which ever ones i think i need! in a given situation

1.31.18  3:13 pm   How much effort do you put in answer your questions ?

     i think i have used every different possible amount of effort before, on these questions

1.31.18  3:11 pm   Do you ever answer these questions seriously ?

     yes

1.31.18  3:09 pm   did you know that people are slightly bioluminescent?

     yes

1.31.18  2:46 pm   Pretty please tell me something about yourself that no one else knows

     by the time you read it, many other people would know

1.31.18  2:44 pm   i used to be able to write these really interesting songs full of funky key changes, triplets, duplets and dissonance. now after going to music school and having all this theory pounded into my brain i'm always too afraid to write music the way i like it. what do i do?

     have you considered going to a bog, and spending time in the bog

1.31.18  2:36 pm   What's more meaningless -- life, or your videos?

     i don't know but i think they both have meaning

1.31.18  2:34 pm   from watching your reality videos, i discern a logical and rigorous approach to your creative method. it seems like you work pretty FUCKING hard, too. but my question is: do you use algorithms or randomization generating during your actual creative process.

     i use it for some things

      maybe i could eat blades of grass, soap tips, and hi, i'm steve all have elements of a thrilling randomization of consciousness that... defy my scholarly tone (if eel like a bad person)

     randomization was not used in those videos in any way

1.31.18  1:58 pm   Are you sure you're a human?

     i will check

1.31.18  1:49 pm   We are studying world history and all I can think about are your jingles from history of the world, i guess. Why is that?

     because they are probably talking about a lot of the same subjects

1.31.18  1:47 pm   should i use capital letters when i write or be like you

     if you want to write like me then you are going to want to use capital letters some times

1.31.18  1:31 pm   How do you feel about the Cambrian Explosion?

     pretty good

1.31.18  1:31 pm   why have you stopped updating your 'reality' page on this website, is there nothing to tell?

      1.16.18  7:26 pm

1.31.18  1:30 pm   How does universe is weird?

     sometimes that's just the only way to get the job done

1.31.18  1:29 pm   when is bedtime?

     for bed owners it can fortunately be any time

1.31.18  12:58 pm   Where did you learn all the instrument you play

     at home, and in the workplace

1.31.18  12:49 pm   when is music?

     at musictime

1.31.18  12:27 pm   Do you work in the postal system?

     no but i play in it!

1.31.18  12:16 pm   was the "blades of grass" jingle written during one of those vine sessions in 2015

     no but it could have been

     or was it written specifically for this video?

     yes

1.31.18  12:12 pm   Do you tell the truth?

     yes, it's one of my hobbies

1.31.18  12:00 pm   Are you my mother

     i will check

1.31.18  11:58 am   what's the purpose of art?

     see how many purposes it can have

1.31.18  11:58 am   Why was the rock wearing a plaid shirt?

      1.30.18  8:28 pm

1.31.18  11:43 am   Do you know a lot?

     yes, but there's more

1.31.18  11:37 am   I see that you started to use capital letters....

     i've been using them all my life

      what has changed though?

     nothing

1.31.18  11:36 am   Have you ever been to England?

     will i ever leave

1.31.18  11:25 am   What is your favourite shape?

     the world

1.31.18  11:22 am   when will you release a full-length album

     i think i prefer to release songs individually

1.31.18  11:00 am   what is an aesthetic

     i think it's a type of plant?

1.31.18  9:38 am   why do you use capital letters sometimes?

      1.1.18  1:40 pm

1.31.18  9:27 am   Without being vague or sarcastic, no offence, could you describe a little more behind the motives and meanings of "Blade of grass",

     1.30.18  7:23 pm

      I find it a little more spontaneous and feel it might be deeper, as it kinda made me feel sad inside for some reason. am I just overthinking? 

     i don't want you to feel sad. i hope that's not my fault

1.31.18  9:08 am   What is the best way to learn French

     live in france, be born there if possible

1.31.18  8:57 am   Where does it all stop?

     everywhere, which is also where it starts. pretty convenient

1.31.18  8:21 am   What's your most embarassing moment

     10.4.17  1:00 am

1.31.18  8:17 am   Will you ever do a livestream Q&A to get to know your fans a bit better/ to help your fans know you a bit better outside of the normal videos, or is that not your 'style'?

     this is where i usually do questions. i have answered at least 50,000 so far but i am answering more still

1.31.18  8:17 am   i'm curious about the creative process behin "blades of grass" 

     1.27.18  7:17 pm

1.31.18  7:36 am   I have a problem, whenever I read a script I always change some of the words to make it sound nice.

     that's not a probem if you are the writer

      I was reading the script for the Japan video and its a bit different to the actual video and I wondered if you do that to.

     yes, when i'm the writer. i actually do it in my mind for other people's work too, but i have a special pillow that i can bite which keeps me from telling them all of the changes i would make

1.31.18  7:20 am   what do you think about surrealism?

     it sure seems real

1.31.18  6:51 am   Do the visuals in your songs have meaning?

     yes, they are supposed to synchronize with the song

1.31.18  5:26 am   how come we don't have a word for the day after tomorrow?

     we do but it changes every day
